class.name: VisualScriptCustomNode
class.description: A custom Visual Script node which can be scripted in powerful ways.

method.name: _get_input_value_port_count
method.description: Return the count of input value ports.

method.name: _get_input_value_port_hint
method.description: Return the specified input port's hint. See the [enum @GlobalScope.PropertyHint] hints.

method.name: _get_input_value_port_hint_string
method.description: Return the specified input port's hint string.

method.name: _get_input_value_port_name
method.description: Return the specified input port's name.

method.name: _get_input_value_port_type
method.description: Return the specified input port's type. See the [enum Variant.Type] values.

method.name: _get_output_sequence_port_count
method.description: Return the amount of output [b]sequence[/b] ports.

method.name: _get_output_value_port_count
method.description: Return the amount of output value ports.

method.name: _get_output_value_port_hint
method.description: Return the specified output port's hint. See the [enum @GlobalScope.PropertyHint] hints.

method.name: _get_output_value_port_hint_string
method.description: Return the specified output port's hint string.

method.name: _get_output_value_port_name
method.description: Return the specified output port's name.

method.name: _get_output_value_port_type
method.description: Return the specified output port's type. See the [enum Variant.Type] values.

method.name: _get_text
method.description: Return the custom node's text, which is shown right next to the input [b]sequence[/b] port (if there is none, on the place that is usually taken by it).

method.name: _get_working_memory_size
method.description: Return the size of the custom node's working memory. See [method _step] for more details.

method.name: _has_input_sequence_port
method.description: Return whether the custom node has an input [b]sequence[/b] port.

method.name: _step
method.description: Execute the custom node's logic, returning the index of the output sequence port to use or a [String] when there is an error. The [code]inputs[/code] array contains the values of the input ports. [code]outputs[/code] is an array whose indices should be set to the respective outputs. The [code]start_mode[/code] is usually [constant START_MODE_BEGIN_SEQUENCE], unless you have used the [code]STEP_*[/code] constants. [code]working_mem[/code] is an array which can be used to persist information between runs of the custom node. The size needs to be predefined using [method _get_working_memory_size]. When returning, you can mask the returned value with one of the [code]STEP_*[/code] constants.

constants.constant: The start mode used the first time when [method _step] is called.
The start mode used when [method _step] is called after coming back from a [constant STEP_PUSH_STACK_BIT].
The start mode used when [method _step] is called after resuming from [constant STEP_YIELD_BIT].

Hint used by [method _step] to tell that control should return to it when there is no other node left to execute. This is used by [VisualScriptCondition] to redirect the sequence to the "Done" port after the [code]true[/code]/[code]false[/code] branch has finished execution.
Hint used by [method _step] to tell that control should return back, either hitting a previous [constant STEP_PUSH_STACK_BIT] or exiting the function.
Hint used by [method _step] to tell that control should stop and exit the function.
Hint used by [method _step] to tell that the function should be yielded. Using this requires you to have at least one working memory slot, which is used for the [VisualScriptFunctionState].
